title: can we please revert the changes to morgana's passive
body:
can we take {{champion:25}} back to 7.23?

the 7.24 passive change was a fucking abomination both before and after its "hotfix".

the only morgana that didn't get heavily nerfed from this change was "jungle" morgana.
right.. because that's totally a thing riot...

lets remove her ability to heal in lane,  but as compensation.. lets make her stronger vs jungle camps.. becuase that's what she fucking needed.

please for the love of... idk... revert this shit

i really don't even care about the other changes.. but PLEASE give her her old passive back...

replies.body: It's unlikely. If the stance is that it's bad that we diminished her ability to heal up by puddling every wave, that's kinda the point.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EcA2hwGs,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-03-10T07:53:09.866+0000)
>
> It's unlikely. If the stance is that it's bad that we diminished her ability to heal up by puddling every wave, that's kinda the point.

It's just a bit jerky to morg support players.  She was my main support in climbing and still is my favourite.  I would sustain in lane a little bit by pooling a wave, especially when we needed to shove.  Now that it's only on cannon minions and champs, both of which provide little especially since champs flee your pool pretty quick, you don't last nearly as long in lane which makes it even harder against heal supports or the popular tanky supports of right now.  Given Morgana is basically considered a support champ now with even recommended items saying support, she's not a Jung or common Mid, it stings to see such nerfs to her main role because she was a bit strong in an off meta area.
I always though she was supposed to be mainly mid to oppose kayle.

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EcA2hwGs,comment-id=000300010001,timestamp=2018-03-10T16:57:31.245+0000)
>
> I always though she was supposed to be mainly mid to oppose kayle.

She was, but she's now become a support more often than not.  If you go to her recommended items, it should list support items (at least it does for me).  She might be one that has two recommended, I haven't checked recently.  

> [{quoted}](name=EROTIC RAID BOSS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EcA2hwGs,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2018-03-10T16:54:31.370+0000)
>
> they can always buff morg mid and support in healthier ways, so that she cant just sustain through everything but is more powerful in a direct fight, if she needs buffs

As a support you never just "sustained through everything" as you never had enough damage to heal the way a mid Morg would.  That's why it hit support Morg harder because she wasn't just mass healing, but healing a tiny bit off of everything to keep herself going in lane.  Now she heals a tiny bit off of some things, the majority of which are enemy champs that will just walk away from your pool.
they can always buff morg mid and support in healthier ways, so that she cant just sustain through everything but is more powerful in a direct fight, if she needs buffs

I guess is the point where i admit defeat.

because that is EXACTLY what the changes did. so if _that_ was the purpose. then i have to say the change was indeed executed perfectly in relation to your intended effect.


anyways.. thanks for that. At least i feel less bad about the change now.
even if i don't feel the nerf was necessary myself,  i know that the balance team perfectly executed their desired change. 
And that is something that that makes be feel at least a little better.

And cho heal is a joke unless you count eternity passive of roa/abyssal. But morgana could go roa as well. Morgana mid is currently the strongest it has been in years. The new runes + mage itemization changes are absolutely insane on her. I can't talk about support Morg though.

but as support you get to spend your whole time tring to poke them.. and u get TWO targets to choose from. and thanks to riot fucking deleting sightstone.

She didn’t need the sustain. It only made her even stronger. Her Spellshield allowed to her to nullify magic damage entirely in lane, effectively at least. Her Q is oppsive and often allows to her take no damage at all while dishing out a lot. She doesn’t need lane sustain on top of that.

Morgana mid was probably the least interact mid in the entire game, bar none. The combination of strong wave clear, boss sustain, magic damage absorb + status ailment immunity, and oodles of hard CC.. Meant she was an immovable object.

Morgana has been pick / ban level of mid strength at numerous times in the game, but pretty much always fallen out of favor due to meta shifts rather than nerfs. Generally when AD assassins become extraordinarily strong, insane levels of mobility are mandatory, or there are no viable routes to make a mage semi beefy.

Currently she has two out of three in her favor, plus she fits perfectly into the "shove & roam" meta.
